## Checklist
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] The PR has at least one of the following labels:
  - `documentation`
  - `enhancement`
  - `major-version`
  - `minor-version`
  - `breaking-change`
- _Optional_
  - [ ] Extended the CHANGELOG, if necessary/new release
  - [ ] Extended the README / documentation, if necessary
  - [ ] Added new tests, if necessary
